pages.title: About
pages.content:
About AppFlow

AppFlow was born from a simple observation: teams spend more time managing work than doing work. Founded in 2024 by a team of productivity researchers and engineers, we set out to build the tool we always wished existed.

Today, AppFlow powers over 10,000 teams across 50 countries, from startups to Fortune 500 companies. Our mission remains the same: make work feel effortless.

articles.title: Announcing AppFlow 3.0: AI-Powered Workflow Automation
articles.content:
Today we're thrilled to launch AppFlow 3.0, our biggest update ever. At its core: an AI engine that learns how your team works and automates the repetitive stuff so you can focus on what matters.

New features include Smart Scheduling, Auto-Assign, and Predictive Deadlines. Early beta users report a 40% reduction in time spent on project management tasks.
articles.excerpt: Our biggest update introduces AI-powered automation that learns your workflow patterns.

articles.title: 10 Proven Strategies for Remote Team Productivity
articles.content:
Managing a distributed team doesn't have to mean sacrificing productivity. Based on our analysis of 5,000+ remote teams using AppFlow, here are the strategies that consistently lead to better outcomes.

The data is clear: asynchronous communication, clear documentation, and regular check-ins (not check-ups) are the foundations of high-performing remote teams.
articles.excerpt: Data-driven strategies from 5,000+ remote teams that consistently deliver better results.

articles.title: The ROI of Workflow Automation: Real Numbers from Real Teams
articles.content:
We surveyed 200 AppFlow Enterprise customers about the impact of workflow automation on their bottom line. The results surprised even us.

On average, teams saved 12 hours per employee per month after implementing automation. At a loaded cost of $75/hour, that's $10,800 per employee per year in recovered productivity.
articles.excerpt: Enterprise customers report saving 12 hours per employee per month through workflow automation.

articles.title: AppFlow Achieves SOC 2 Type II Certification
articles.content: Security has always been foundational to AppFlow, and today we're proud to announce our SOC 2 Type II certification. This independently audited certification validates our commitment to protecting your data.
articles.excerpt: Our SOC 2 Type II certification validates enterprise-grade security practices.
